color_theme: professional blue and silver with orange accents (#1E3A8A, #64748B, #F97316)

content.prompt: Build a visually appealing, high-converting website for Elite Auto Repair, a local automotive repair business. Design should be premium yet approachable, with modern aesthetics and playful details tailored for local customers.

sections.name: Navbar
sections.description: Sticky, animated hover, Elite Auto Repair logo, small wrench icon

sections.name: Hero
sections.description: Full-width from-blue-900 via-blue-700 to-blue-500 gradient, bold headline, tagline, CTA (Schedule Service Today), large placeholder image
sections.mobile: Use 'h-screen md:h-96', 'flex-col md:flex-row' for responsive layout

sections.name: About
sections.description: Placeholder team/workspace image, short story text about 20+ years serving the community

sections.name: Services
sections.description: Cards with placeholder image per service: Oil Changes, Brake Repair, Engine Diagnostics, Transmission Service
sections.mobile: Grid with 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3' responsive columns

sections.name: Testimonials
sections.description: Placeholder customer/project images, glassmorphism review cards with 5-star ratings from satisfied customers

sections.name: Gallery
sections.description: Grid of 6â€“8 placeholder work images showing before/after repairs, clean shop interior
sections.mobile: Grid with 'grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4' responsive layout

sections.name: Contact
sections.description: Contact form, embedded map showing shop location, placeholder garage background image

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Elite Auto Repair logo, quick links, social media icons, placeholder subtle pattern background

images.sources: Use two recyclable placeholder images from Unsplash for all sections. I'll replace them with actual images later.
images.styling: Use 'w-full h-auto' for responsive images, 'object-cover' for consistent sizing

typography.mobile: Use 'text-2xl md:text-4xl' for responsive font sizes

style.colors: professional blue and silver with orange accents (#1E3A8A, #64748B, #F97316)

design.vibe: premium, trustworthy, professional yet approachable for local car owners

mobile.layout: Use 'flex flex-col' for mobile, 'md:flex-row' for desktop stacking
mobile.navigation: Hidden mobile menu with 'hidden md:flex', hamburger with 'md:hidden'
mobile.spacing: Use 'p-4 md:p-8', 'm-2 md:m-4' for responsive padding/margins
mobile.containers: Use 'max-w-full md:max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4' for responsive containers
